document_data.name: Hukdon
document_data.mainbody: '''Hukdon''' was a member of the [[Shadow Thieves]] in [[Athkatla]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Hukdon was very ill-mannered but he thought of himself as funny and likeable. Many underestimated him for his puny appearance.
document_data.Possession: Somehow Hukdon acquired a pair of ''[[gauntlets of ogre power]]''.
document_data.Activities: Hukdon worked for the enforcer and thugs chapter of the guild in Athkatla. His boss usually used him only when a "client" needed punishment, not for mere intimidation work.
